16.heading: Jodhpur.
16.title: "Durgadas : the Loyal Courtier"
16.author: script, Ramesh Sinha ; illustrations, V
16.appears_in: B. Halbe ; editor, Anant Pai. p. 1-32 in Amar Chitra Katha, no. 739 (1974, 2009 printing).
notes: Summary from back cover: "The struggle for power between the Rajputs and Mughals during the medieval period in Indian history is replete with stories of courage on both sides. One such tale that is oft repeated is that of Durgadas, the son of the prime minister of King Jaswant Singh of Jodhpur. He vowed to liberate Jodhpur from the Mughal overlords and crown Jaswant Singh's son Ajeet Singh as king. Loyal Durgadas plotted and planned to achieve this goal all his life. With a combination of valour and wile he managed to succeed in his mission after Aurangzeb's death in 1707."

97.heading: Jodorowsky, Alexandro, 1929- --Articles About.
97.title: "Jodorowsky : el Chileno Ecléctico
97.author: Manuel Barrero
97.appears_in: p. 91-107 in La Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios sobre la Historieta, v. 1, no. 2 (Junio 2001).
notes: Resumen: "El chileno Alejandro Jodorowsky es un creador de múltiples facetas. Interesado por el arte en todas sus formas, comenzó su carrera como actor y autor teatral en Chile, Paris y México, y ha probado suerte en la historieta, la literatura y el cine; sin dejar nunca de lado la magia y el esoterismo, que también practica. En las siguientes lineas le conoceremos mejor como persona y como cineasta, dejando el repaso a su historieta para una siguiente entrega."

Abstract: Chilean Alejandro Jodorowsky is a multifaceted creator. Interested in all art forms, he started his career as an actor and playwright in Chile, Paris and Mexico, and has had considerable success in comics, literature and movies, not to mention the magic and occultism which he also practices. In the following pages we will get to know him better as a person and a filmmaker, leaving the consideration of his comics for a following installment.
Abstracts as printed with the article, with some editing of the English.
Includes bibliographical references and one illustration.

98.heading: Jodorowsky, Alexandro, 1929- --Articles About.
98.title: "Jodorowsky : el Chileno Ecléctico
98.author: Manuel Barrero
98.appears_in: p. 167-181 in La Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios sobre la Historieta, v. 1, no. 3 (Sept. 2001).
notes: Resumen: "Recientement ha tenido lugar una gran exposición de historeta de Jodorowsky en Francia. 1,500 portadas y páginas de cómic originals. Un gran honor para un chileno que estudió en México, lo cual es el resultado del enorme éxito de sus sagas de historieta en todo el mundo: Italia, Portugal, Alemania, España y, también, en los EE.UU. Si te gusta la fantasia heroica, la ciencia ficción, los superhéroes o lo esotérico, entonces te gustarán los cómics de Jodo. Echemos un vistazo a su carrera como guionista de historietas."

Abstract: Recently a large exhibition of the comics of Jodorowsky took place in France, with 1,500 originals of covers and comics pages. A big honor for a man from Chile, who studied in Mexico, and a result of the great success of his comics sagas all over the world: in Italy, Portugal, Germany, Spain and also in the United States of America. If you're fond of fantasy, science fiction, superheros or esoterism, then you like Jodo's comics. Let's take a look at his career as a scripter of comics.
Abstracts as printed with the article; some editing of the English.

(Martin Veyron) ; "Princes de la Nuit" (Denis Jourdin) ; "Les Pionniers de l'Esperance, t. 4" (Raymond Lécureux & Roger Poïvet) ; "Marion Duval no. 4: Un Croco dans la Loire" (Yvan Pommaux) p. 33 ; "La Cinquième Essence 1: Galaxie qui Songe" (Moebius & Jodorowsky)

120.title: "Jodorowsky : el Chileno Ecléctico
120.author: Manuel Barrero
120.appears_in: p. 91-107 in La Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios sobre la Historieta, v. 1, no. 2 (Junio 2001).
notes: Resumen: "El chileno Alejandro Jodorowsky es un creador de múltiples facetas. Interesado por el arte en todas sus formas, comenzó su carrera como actor y autor teatral en Chile, Paris y México, y ha probado suerte en la historieta, la literatura y el cine; sin dejar nunca de lado la magia y el esoterismo, que también practica. En las siguientes lineas le conoceremos mejor como persona y como cineasta, dejando el repaso a su historieta para una siguiente entrega."

Abstract: Chilean Alejandro Jodorowsky is a multifaceted creator. Interested in all art forms, he started his career as an actor and playwright in Chile, Paris and Mexico, and has had considerable success in comics, literature and movies, not to mention the magic and occultism which he also practices. In the following pages we will get to know him better as a person and a filmmaker, leaving the consideration of his comics for a following installment.
Abstracts as printed with the article, with some editing of the English.
Includes bibliographical references and one illustration.

121.title: "Jodorowsky : el Chileno Ecléctico
121.author: Manuel Barrero
121.appears_in: p. 167-181 in La Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios sobre la Historieta, v. 1, no. 3 (Sept. 2001).
notes: Resumen: "Recientement ha tenido lugar una gran exposición de historeta de Jodorowsky en Francia. 1,500 portadas y páginas de cómic originals. Un gran honor para un chileno que estudió en México, lo cual es el resultado del enorme éxito de sus sagas de historieta en todo el mundo: Italia, Portugal, Alemania, España y, también, en los EE.UU. Si te gusta la fantasia heroica, la ciencia ficción, los superhéroes o lo esotérico, entonces te gustarán los cómics de Jodo. Echemos un vistazo a su carrera como guionista de historietas."

Abstract: Recently a large exhibition of the comics of Jodorowsky took place in France, with 1,500 originals of covers and comics pages. A big honor for a man from Chile, who studied in Mexico, and a result of the great success of his comics sagas all over the world: in Italy, Portugal, Germany, Spain and also in the United States of America. If you're fond of fantasy, science fiction, superheros or esoterism, then you like Jodo's comics. Let's take a look at his career as a scripter of comics.
Abstracts as printed with the article; some editing of the English.
